definition: neck/collar/to lead/to receive/classifier for clothes, mats, screens etc
spiritual leader (of a nation or church)/religious leader

sentences.english: Beaverton's % Mayor Doyle wants refugee and immigrant leaders to participate in the town's decision-making.
sentences.chinese: 比弗頓市長道爾希望難民和移民領袖參與本市的決策。

sentences.english: Wake AHu, fasten readme named one of poison arrow tribal leaders.

sentences.english: The meeting was brought to a climax by the appearance on the platform of the rebel leader.
sentences.chinese: 起義軍的領袖出現在臺上時會議達到了高潮。

sentences.english: Will business leaders succumb to these ideas?
sentences.chinese: 商業領袖們會被這些觀點折服嗎？

sentences.english: The party was kept together by personal loyalty to the leader.
sentences.chinese: 這個黨是靠對領袖的個人忠誠而維繫在一起的。

sentences.english: Some religious leaders have also spoken out against fourth sexuality.
sentences.chinese: 一些宗教領袖也公開表示反對第四性。

sentences.english: The great leader emerged from a poor family.
sentences.chinese: 偉大領袖出身於一個貧苦家庭。

sentences.english: Bryan remained the titular head of the party .
Bismarck was enormously powerful in his 26 years as Prussia's political leader.
sentences.chinese: 在擔任普魯士政治領袖的26年間，俾斯麥位高權重。

sentences.english: "There is no discipline in our squad, " Stambouli added. "Just look at our leader, Adebayor.
sentences.chinese: 只要看看我們的球隊領袖，阿德巴約。

sentences.english: Therefore the Jewish leaders asked the Roman government to execute him.
sentences.chinese: 因而，宗教領袖要求羅馬政府處死他。

sentences.english: Democratic leaders think this is a matter of basic tax fairness.
sentences.chinese: 民主黨領袖認爲這是個稅務公平的基本問題。

sentences.english: To achieve these, a leader needs communication as a main tool.
sentences.chinese: 一個領袖需要善用溝通作爲工具來達到以上幾點。

sentences.english: I am the democratically elected leader of a freedom-loving democracy. We are a compassionate society.
sentences.chinese: 俺是熱愛自由的民主國家的民主選舉出來的領袖。

sentences.english: A great number of the Nationalist Party leaders came from Guangdong Province, the cradle of the party.
sentences.chinese: 國民黨發跡於廣東，也造就了大批粵籍黨國領袖。

sentences.english: But great leaders need to do more than speak well.
sentences.chinese: 不過，偉大的領袖不只需要“說得好”。

definition: to crane one's neck/to await eagerly/to lead/to show the way
to praise/to approve of/to show approval
